add something ↔ on.translation[0].defini: to include or put on something extra
proposals to add a penny on income tax
The private chapel was added on to the church much later.
add something ↔ on.translation[1].defini: something extra that is added to an existing plan, agreement, law etc
We bought legal protection as an add-on to our home insurance policy.
a piece of equipment that you connect to a computer to improve its performance
a product that is designed to be used with another product
add something ↔ on.translation[2].defini: a product that is sold to be used with another product
You can have legal insurance as an add-on to a household policy.
a piece of equipment or software that you connect to a computer, usually in order to improve its performance
We’ve compiled an extensive list of add-ons to make browsing with Internet Explorer more productive.
